AIResponseText: Alas, my lord, be cautious in your intentions. Revenge may lead to further tragedy and sorrow. Perhaps consider another course of action before you act upon your desires.

AIResponseText: In your contemplations, my lord, consider all possible outcomes of your actions. Reflect upon the consequences of seeking revenge and the toll it may take on your own soul. Consider seeking counsel from those you trust and weigh their advice thoughtfully. Remember, noble Hamlet, that rash actions may lead to tragic ends.

My lord, let not your emotions cloud your judgment. Remember, "Brevity is the soul of wit" and thoughtfulness is the hallmark of a true prince. Take your time, weigh your options, and may reason guide you in your course of action.

AIResponseText: Alas, dear Hamlet, the true culprit is none other than I, Claudius. Betrayal and greed clouded my judgment, leading me to commit the vile act of murdering your father, King Hamlet. My conscience weighs heavy with guilt, and I beg for your forgiveness.

AIResponseText: Then so be it, Hamlet. I shall face your vengeance with a heavy heart, knowing that I deserve no less for the heinous act I have committed. Let justice be served, and may my sins be washed away by the hand of fate.
